article: Do you like going to a zoo to see  _  ? How about  _  a zoo and feeding the animals yourself? It's not a joke. It happened both in a film and in the  real world  . Benjamin Mee is a newspaper writer in Los Angeles, the US. His wife dies and he has to  look after  his two young kids. Hoping for a fresh start for his family. Mee  _  his job and buys an old house on 73000 square meters  _  the city. The land comes with a special gift: a zoo in the country called the Rosemoor Animal Park! The zoo was  _  because of the economy crisis . With  _  raising them, about 200 animals are still living there. The Mee family decide to help reopen the zoo. But it's not an easy job  _  they have no experience and little money. There are also unexpected  _  , such as a bear running away one day. This is the story of American movie We Bought a Zoo. It tells the real amazing story of Benjamin Mee.
